attributes.action: resurface the road from Burghfield to Mortimer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The road which connects these two villages is in a dire state. It has been neglected for years and can only be described as agricultural. The tax payers' pound can only be spent once but this is beyond a local joke. Call it fiscal stimulus, call it what you want - just please get it done. Progress of this petition will be emailed to Newbury Council every month. Pass the message on.
